allow:
Bash("C:/Program Files/R/R-4.4.1/bin/Rscript.exe" -e "
suppressPackageStartupMessages\({
  library\(tidyverse\)
}\)

# Load and merge data
MainDF <- read.csv\(''Raw.csv''\)
StoreDF <- read.csv\(''StoreTable.csv''\)
ConcessDF <- read.csv\(''ConcessTable.csv''\)
CustomerDF <- read.csv\(''CustomerTable.csv''\)

FFdf <- MainDF
FFdf <- merge\(FFdf, StoreDF, by = ''Cust_ID'', all.x = TRUE\)
FFdf <- merge\(FFdf, ConcessDF, by = ''Cust_ID'', all.x = TRUE\)
FFdf <- merge\(FFdf, CustomerDF, by = ''Cust_ID'', all.x = TRUE\)

cat\(''=== DATASET DIMENSIONS ===\\n''\)
cat\(''Rows:'', nrow\(FFdf\), ''Cols:'', ncol\(FFdf\), ''\\n\\n''\)

# Clean names
names\(FFdf\) <- gsub\(''\\.'', ''_'', names\(FFdf\)\)
names\(FFdf\) <- gsub\('' '', ''_'', names\(FFdf\)\)

# Convert chars to factors
chr_vars <- names\(FFdf\)[sapply\(FFdf, is.character\)]
for\(var in chr_vars\) { FFdf[[var]] <- as.factor\(FFdf[[var]]\) }

# Convert 999 to NA
FFdf[[''DistA'']][FFdf[[''DistA'']] == 999] <- NA

cat\(''=== STEP 6: KEY CATEGORICAL DISTRIBUTIONS ===\\n''\)
cat\(''\\n--- Sex ---\\n''\); print\(table\(FFdf[[''Sex'']], useNA=''ifany''\)\)
cat\(''\\n--- Marital ---\\n''\); print\(table\(FFdf[[''Marital'']], useNA=''ifany''\)\)
cat\(''\\n--- Account_Type ---\\n''\); print\(table\(FFdf[[''Account_Type'']], useNA=''ifany''\)\)
cat\(''\\n--- Educational_Level ---\\n''\); print\(table\(FFdf[[''Educational_Level'']], useNA=''ifany''\)\)

cat\(''\\n=== STATE DISTRIBUTION \(Top 10\) ===\\n''\)
print\(head\(sort\(table\(FFdf[[''State_Name'']]\), decreasing=TRUE\), 10\)\)
cat\(''Total unique states:'', length\(unique\(FFdf[[''State_Name'']]\)\), ''\\n''\)
")
